name: checked
description: Indicates whether the element is selected by default on page load.
usage: Do not change the value (i.e. presence) of this attribute with Javascript.

name: aria-checked
description: Indicates the current state of relevant form elements.

false.description: The element supports being checked but is not currently checked.

mixed.description: Indicates a mixed mode value for a tri-state checkbox or menuitemcheckbox.

undefined.description: The element does not support being checked.
